item.title: ReF-LDM: A Latent Diffusion Model for Reference-based Face Image Restoration
item.description: ReF-LDM uses reference images to improve the accuracy of face image restoration, achieving high-quality results faithful to the subject’s true appearance.

item.title: StepbaQ: Stepping backward as Correction for Quantized Diffusion Models
item.description: StepbaQ enhances quantized diffusion models by correcting accumulated quantization errors via a novel sampling step correction mechanism, significantly improving model accuracy without modifying exist…
